amendment.description: Amendment ensures that the Administration is able to ban the export of crude oil to state sponsors of terrorism.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 5 printed in Part B of House Report 114-290 to ensure the Administration is able to ban the export of crude oil to state sponsors of terrorism.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Messer amendment (A005) Agreed to by recorded vote: 414 - 1 (Roll no. 546).

action.text: Roll call votes on amendments in House
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Messer amendment (A005) Agreed to by recorded vote: 414 - 1 (Roll no. 546).
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A005) offered by Mr. Messer.
